# intendedSpatialExperience

**Instance Property**

The AUAudioUnit’s intended spatial audio experience.

## Declaration

```swift
var intendedSpatialExperience: any SpatialAudioExperience { get set }
```

## Discussion

This value is only useful for output audio units; otherwise it’s a no-op.

If unspecified, the property value defaults to [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AutomaticSpatialAudio].
title: intendedSpatialExperience
